statements: UPDATE historical_data SET quantity = 10 WHERE shipment_id = 123;
UPDATE historical_data SET arrival_date = '2022-05-15', departure_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE historical_data SET arrival_date = '2022-10-15', departure_date = '2023-01-20' WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
UPDATE historical_data SET product_name = 'Laptop', quantity = 50 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE CrossDockEfficiencyAnalysis SET processing_time_hrs = 4.5 WHERE shipment_id = 1234;
UPDATE TrendAnalysis SET trend_description = 'Analysis of market trends in Q3' WHERE trend_id = 5678;
UPDATE CrossDockEfficiencyAnalysis SET processing_time_hrs = 4.5, analysis_result = 'Efficient' WHERE shipment_id = 100
UPDATE TrendAnalysis SET data_range_start = '2022-01-01', data_range_end = '2022-12-31', trend_description = 'Analyzing trends for the entire year' WHERE trend_id = 50
UPDATE historical_data SET data = 'Updated data example 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trends SET trend_description = 'New description for trend 3' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE historical_data SET data = 'Updated data' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE trends SET trend_description = 'Improved trend description' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE historical_orders SET quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 12345;
UPDATE trends_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Positive' WHERE analysis_id = 54321;
UPDATE historical_orders SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE warehouse_inventory SET location = 'North Warehouse', quantity = 150 WHERE product_id = 200;
UPDATE historical_sales SET sale_amount = 1500.00 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE trend_analysis SET trend_description = 'Analyze sales trend for Q4 2021' WHERE trend_id = 3
UPDATE historical_sales SET sale_amount = sale_amount + 10 WHERE product_id = 100 AND sale_date > '2021-01-01';
UPDATE warehouse_locations SET city = 'New York', state = 'NY' WHERE location_id = 1;
